 b=input()
 c=input()
 def daonguoc(a):
     for i in range(len(a)-1,-1,-1):
-        print(i)
+        print(a[i],end='')
 daonguoc(a)
 daonguoc(b)
 daonguoc(c)

     for i in range(len(a)-1,-1,-1):
-        print(a[i],end='')
-daonguoc(a)
-daonguoc(b)
\ No newline at end of file
-daonguoc(c)
+        kq=kq+a[i]
+print(daonguoc(a))
+print(daonguoc(b))
+print(daonguoc(c))
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -6,7 +6,8 @@
 def daonguoc(a):
     kq=''
     for i in range(len(a)-1,-1,-1):
         kq=kq+a[i]
+    return kq
 print(daonguoc(a))
 print(daonguoc(b))
 print(daonguoc(c))
\ No newline at end of file

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
#3 chuoi, dao nguoc 3 chuoi va in ra man hinh
#in: python list exercises
a=input()
b=input()
c=input()
def daonguoc(a):
    for i in range(len(a)-1,-1,-1):
        print(i)
daonguoc(a)
daonguoc(b)
daonguoc(c)
